headline: Trillium Urges Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) Shareholders to Vote for Lobbying Alignment Report
summary: Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) recently faced a 5.63% decline in its stock price over the past week, coinciding with significant investor activism and market pressures. Shareholder activism has intensified as Trillium Asset Management, among others, filed proposals for the upcoming April shareholder meeting, advocating for increased transparency in lobbying activities and other governance reforms. Amid these developments, broader market trends have exacerbated the situation. The S&P 500 and...

headline: Bank of America Corporation (BAC) Benefitted from Diverse Sources Of Strength
summary: Parnassus Investments, an investment management company, released the “Parnassus Core Equity Fund” fourth quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the fourth quarter, U.S. stocks rose, closing up a robust 2024. The Fund (Investor Shares) surged 0.28% (net of fees) in the quarter underperforming the S&P 500 Index’s 2.41% […]

headline: Invesco Convertible Securities Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Convertibles (as measured by the ICE BofA US Convertible Index) returned 3.38% for the fourth quarter, compared to the S&P 500 Index, which returned 2.41%.
